project.name: C-C088B-PSQL-07-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C088B-PSQL-07-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database This weakness takes a filename from an untrusted source and uses a subprocess (via popen) to perform a search and replace of the text "hello" with "Hello". The untrusted input is not properly sanitized, and may be used to perform an argument injection on the base command in order to run additional commands or functions.

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C088B-PSQL-07-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF01-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select This weakness takes a filename from an untrusted source and uses a subprocess (via popen) to perform a search and replace of the text "hello" with "Hello". The untrusted input is not properly sanitized, and may be used to perform an argument injection on the base command in order to run additional commands or functions.

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
